job.title: SRE
job.description: DevOps consultant/SRENYC Required Qualifications:4-5 years of work experience year work experience in a DevOps or Site Reliability Engineer role.Good working knowledge in production/application supportGood with OOP concepts and Python programming/scriptingStrong Computer Science fundamentals in Data Structures, Algorithms, Complexity Analysis, Object-Oriented Design and Designing Large Scale Data-Intensive Applications.4+ years industry experience in Expert Knowledge in Linux, Python, Shell, JavaScript, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, RedisComfortable multi-tasking, managing multiple stakeholders and working as part of a team Preferred Qualifications:Experience in ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) or Prometheus + GrafanaExperience with continuous deployment/delivery practicesAWS Certifications such as Solution Architect, DevOps EngineerExperience with Container technologies like Docker, KubernetesExperience with cloud computing systemsNetworking including TCP, HTTP, DNS, SSL certificatesKnowledge of Slang/SecDB is a plus
